org.zoolu.net

Class TcpSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zoolu.net.TcpSocket

  • public class TcpSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    TcpSocket provides a uniform interface to TCP transport protocol, regardless J2SE or J2ME is used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TcpSocket(IpAddress ipaddr, int port, java.lang.String host)
      Creates a new UdpSocket

      Gets the local address to which the socket is bound.

      Gets the local port to which this socket is bound.

      Gets an output stream for this socket.

      Gets the remote port to which this socket is connected.

      Gets the socket timeout.
